trans-unit.source: Represents a single item in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.
An element in a project can represent multiple items through the use of wildcards.
Therefore, each BuildItem object does not necessarily represent an `Item` element in the project.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> class based on an <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> object.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> property of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.

The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref> from which to create the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property values.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Name*> property of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem.Include*> property of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
Creates a shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the item.
The `Condition` attribute value of the item.
Copies all item metadata on this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> to the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref> to which to copy the item metadata.
Gets the number of custom attributes that are set on this item.
The value returned by CustomMetadataCount does include pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers, because they are not custom attributes.
An integer indicating how many custom attributes are set on this item.
Gets all user-defined or custom attribute names.
CustomMetadataNames does not include the names of non-user-defined or non-custom attributes.
An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing string names for all of the user-defined or custom attributes.
Gets or sets the `Exclude` attribute value of the item.
Gets or sets the `Exclude` attribute value of the item.
Gets the final specification of the item after all wildcards and properties have been evaluated.
The final specification of the item after all wildcards and properties have been evaluated.
Returns the value of the specified item metadata after after all item and property references have been evaluated.
The item metadata name.
The value of the specified item metadata after after all item and property references have been evaluated.
Returns the value of the specified item metadata.
The item metadata name.
The value of the specified item metadata.
Indicates whether the item has the specified item metadata.
The item metadata name.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item has the specified item metadata; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the `Include` attribute that created the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
The `Include` attribute that created the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildItem"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the item was imported into the project.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the number of metadata set on the item
The value returned by MetadataCount includes pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers as well as other metadata.
An integer representing the number of metadata items.
Gets the names of metadata on the item, including pre-defined or reserved item-spec modifiers.
The value returned by MetadataNames includes the names of all metadata, including user-defined and custom attributes.
An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> containing name strings of all metadata on the item.
Gets or sets the name of the item collection to which the item belongs.
The name of the item collection to which the item belongs.
Removes the specified item metadata.
The item metadata name.
Assigns the specified value to the specified item metadata.
The item metadata name.
The item metadata value.
Assigns the specified value to the specified item metadata, and optionally treats the metadata as a literal value.
The item metadata name.
The item metadata value.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the metadata as a literal value by escaping all [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] special characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
